canteens.name: The Deck
canteens.directionsText:
1. From Com1 entrance main entrance (facing car park), turn right
2. Walk up the steps

canteens.name: Nus Flavors
canteens.directionsText:
1. From Com1, take shuttle D2 to Utown
2. Follow the path to Stephen Riady Centre 3. Walk straight and the canteen appears to your right
